member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.CredentialsController.SetCredentials(GatewayService.DTOs.Credentials.CredentialRequest)
member.summary: Add credentials from Nira
member.remarks: Accepts credentials of the participant to make requests to nira.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.CredentialsController.GetCurrent
member.summary: Returns the current NIRA credentials that are set in the application. The NIRA Credentials set in the database will return with an Id and ExpiresOn value. Otherwise the Id and ExpiresOn value will not be set if the application is configured to use credentials set in application configuration

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.ExportsController.GetRequestStatus(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get Export Status
member.remarks: Endpoint for getting export status for a specific export request by unique id.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.ExportsController.DownloadAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Download Exported Requests
member.remarks: Endpoint for downloading an export of requests based on an id.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.ExportsController.Create(GatewayService.DTOs.ExportRequest)
member.summary: Make an export of verification requests
member.remarks: Accepts request for export verification requests. Request is queued and processed as soon as possible.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.NitaCredentialsController.PostAsync(GatewayService.DTOs.NitaCredentials.NitaCredentialRequest)
member.summary: Add client credentials from NITA
member.remarks: Accepts client credentials of the participant to make requests to NITA.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.NitaCredentialsController.GetCurrent
member.summary: Returns the current NITA clinet credentials that are set in the application. The NIRA Client Credentials set in the database will return with an Id and CreatedOn value. Otherwise the Id and CreatedOn value will not be set

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.NitaCredentialsController.EditAsync(System.Guid,GatewayService.DTOs.NitaCredentials.NitaCredentialRequest)
member.summary: Edit tiered rates for a specified service category
member.param: Id of NITA client credentials to be updated

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.RequestsController.GetRequestStatus(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get Request Details
member.remarks: Endpoint for getting details of a specific request by unique id.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.RequestsController.SearchRequestsAsync(GatewayService.DTOs.SearchRequest)
member.summary: Search Requests
member.remarks: In case your system would like to search the local database of the Financial Institution Application for existing requests before sending a new request to NIRA, you can use the following end point.

member.name: M:GatewayService.Controllers.RequestsController.Create(GatewayService.DTOs.NationalIdVerificationRequest)
member.summary: Make Verification Request
member.remarks: Accepts requests for verifying Ugandan National ID details. All requests are queued and processed as soon as possible.
